alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 10:43AM CST until February 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SCATTERED SNOW SHOWERS TO REDEVELOP IN THE SNOWBELT TODAY... .Lake effect snow showers will continue to move into Vilas County during the afternoon, and could result in another inch of snow in their snowbelt area. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
